thread.title: BRIEF-Apple Reports Mean Pay Gap In UK Is 5 Pct Lower For Women

title: BRIEF-Apple Reports Mean Pay Gap In UK Is 5 Pct Lower For Women
text:
April 3, 2018 / 5:32 PM / in 4 minutes BRIEF-Apple Reports Mean Pay Gap In UK Is 5 Pct Lower For Women   
April 3 (Reuters) - Apple Inc: 
* FOR APPLE INC, THE MEAN PAY GAP IN THE UK IS 5 PERCENT LOWER FOR WOMEN AND THE MEDIAN PAY GAP IS 2 PERCENT IN FAVOUR OF WOMEN IN 2017 
* AS PART OF COâ€™S COMMITMENT TO ELIMINATING PAY DISPARITIES FROM FIRST DAY AT APPLE, WILL STOP ASKING CANDIDATES ABOUT THEIR SALARY HISTORY 
* 30 PERCENT OF UK EMPLOYEES ARE WOMEN, 36 PERCENT OF NEW EMPLOYEES LAST YEAR WERE WOMEN 
* 88 PERCENT OF WOMEN RECEIVED A BONUS INCLUDING VESTED STOCK; MEAN/ AVERAGE BONUS IS 22 PERCENT LOWER FOR WOMEN Source text : apple.co/2q1oWu4 Further company coverage:
